item.title: Significant Figures
item.description: tags R:Scientific Notation This is an important concept for measurements and limits of experimental uncertainty. It’s important to keep in mind the rules of R:Rounding Anki Cards What does significant digits mean? Front What does significant digits mean? Back The number of accurate digits is called the number of significant digits The counting of significant digits begins from the first nonzero digit from the left and can include digits before the decimal point.
